entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Doaktown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:15 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Doaktown 7:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -7.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -10.0°C
Wind: NE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 15 except minus 20 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then clearing. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 15 except minus 20 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
